member.name: T:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks
member.summary: Callback methods for bucket operations.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.ReadLocation
member.summary: Retrieve location (region) constraint from the server for this bucket. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and LocationConstraint in the body.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.Exists
member.summary: Check for the existence of a bucket. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.Write
member.summary: Write a bucket. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.WriteAcl
member.summary: Write an ACL to a bucket, deleting the previous ACL. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.WriteTags
member.summary: Write tags to a bucket, deleting the previous tags. Success: return an S3Response object with status 204.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.WriteVersioning
member.summary: Set a bucket's versioning policy. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.Read
member.summary: Enumerate a bucket. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and a ListBucketResult object as its data.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.ReadAcl
member.summary: Read a bucket's access control policy. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and an AccessControlPolicy object as its data.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.ReadTags
member.summary: Read a bucket's tags. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and a Tagging object as its data.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.ReadVersions
member.summary: Get a list of object versions in the bucket. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and a ListVersionsResult object as its data.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.ReadVersioning
member.summary: Get a bucket's versioning policy. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and a VersioningConfiguration object as its data.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.Delete
member.summary: Delete a bucket. Success: return an S3Response object with status 204.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.DeleteTags
member.summary: Delete a bucket's tags. Success: return an S3Response object with status 204.

member.name: M:S3ServerInterface.BucketCallbacks.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiate the object.

member.name: T:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks
member.summary: Callback methods for object operations.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.Exists
member.summary: Check for the existence of an object. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.Write
member.summary: Write an object. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.WriteAcl
member.summary: Write an object's access control list, replacing the previous ACL. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.WriteTags
member.summary: Write tags to an object, replacing the previous tags. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.WriteLegalHold
member.summary: Write a legal hold status to an object. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.WriteRetention
member.summary: Write a retention status to an object. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.Read
member.summary: Read an object. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and the object data.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.ReadAcl
member.summary: Read an object's access control list. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and an AccessControlPolicy as its data.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.ReadRange
member.summary: Read a range of bytes from an object. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and the range of bytes as its data.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.ReadTags
member.summary: Read an object's tags. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and a Tagging object as its data.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.ReadLegalHold
member.summary: Read an object's legal hold status. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and a LegalHold object as its data.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.ReadRetention
member.summary: Read an object's retention status. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and a Retention object as its data.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.Delete
member.summary: Delete an object. Success: return an S3Response object with status 204.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.DeleteTags
member.summary: Delete an object's tags. Success: return an S3Response object with status 204.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.DeleteMultiple
member.summary: Delete multiple objects. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and a DeleteResult as its data.

member.name: M:S3ServerInterface.Callbacks.ObjectCallbacks.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiate the object.

member.name: T:S3ServerInterface.ServiceCallbacks
member.summary: Callback methods for service operations.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.ServiceCallbacks.ListBuckets
member.summary: List all buckets. Success: return an S3Response object with status 200 and ListAllMyBucketsResult in the body.

member.name: M:S3ServerInterface.ServiceCallbacks.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiate the object.

member.summary: Enable or disable console debugging for exceptions.

member.name: T:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode
member.summary: Amazon S3 error code.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.AccessDenied
member.summary: Access denied.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.AccountProblem
member.summary: There is a problem with your AWS account that prevents the operation from completing successfully.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.AllAccessDisabled
member.summary: All access to this Amazon S3 resource has been disabled.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.AmbiguousGrantByEmailAddress
member.summary: The email address you provided is associated with more than one account.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.AuthorizationHeaderMalformed
member.summary: The authorization header you provided is invalid.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.BadDigest
member.summary: The Content-MD5 you specified did not match what we received.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.BucketAlreadyExists
member.summary: The requested bucket name is not available. The bucket namespace is shared by all users of the system. Please select a different name and try again.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.BucketAlreadyOwnedByYou
member.summary: The bucket you tried to create already exists, and you own it.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.BucketNotEmpty
member.summary: The bucket you tried to delete is not empty.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.CredentialsNotSupported
member.summary: This request does not support credentials.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.CrossLocationLoggingProhibited
member.summary: Cross-location logging not allowed. Buckets in one geographic location cannot log information to a bucket in another location.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.EntityTooSmall
member.summary: Your proposed upload is smaller than the minimum allowed object size.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.EntityTooLarge
member.summary: Your proposed upload exceeds the maximum allowed object size.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.ExpiredToken
member.summary: The provided token has expired.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.IllegalVersioningConfigurationException
member.summary: Indicates that the versioning configuration specified in the request is invalid.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.IncompleteBody
member.summary: You did not provide the number of bytes specified by the Content-Length HTTP header.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.IncorrectNumberOfFilesInPostRequest
member.summary: POST requires exactly one file upload per request.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InlineDataTooLarge
member.summary: Inline data exceeds the maximum allowed size.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InternalError
member.summary: We encountered an internal error. Please try again.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidAccessKeyId
member.summary: The AWS access key ID you provided does not exist in our records.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidAddressingHeader
member.summary: You must specify the Anonymous role.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidArgument
member.summary: Invalid Argument.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidBucketName
member.summary: The specified bucket is not valid.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidBucketState
member.summary: The request is not valid with the current state of the bucket.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidDigest
member.summary: The Content-MD5 you specified is not valid.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidEncryptionAlgorithmError
member.summary: The encryption request you specified is not valid. The valid value is AES256.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidLocationConstraint
member.summary: The specified location constraint is not valid.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidObjectState
member.summary: The operation is not valid for the current state of the object.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidPart
member.summary: One or more of the specified parts could not be found. The part might not have been uploaded, or the specified entity tag might not have matched the part's entity tag.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidPartOrder
member.summary: The list of parts was not in ascending order. Parts list must be specified in order by part number.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidPayer
member.summary: All access to this object has been disabled.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidPolicyDocument
member.summary: The content of the form does not meet the conditions specified in the policy document.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidRange
member.summary: The requested range cannot be satisfied.

member.summary: Your request is invalid.

member.summary: The provided security credentials are not valid.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidSOAPRequest
member.summary: The SOAP request body is invalid.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Objects.ErrorCode.InvalidStorageClass
member.summary: The storage class you specified is not valid.

member.summary: The target bucket for logging does not exist, is not owned by you, or does not have the appropriate grants for the log-delivery group.

member.summary: The provided token is malformed or otherwise invalid.

member.summary: The XML you provided was not well-formed or did not validate against our published schema.

member.summary: Your request was too big.

member.summary: Your POST request fields preceding the upload file were too large.

member.summary: Your metadata headers exceed the maximum allowed metadata size.

member.summary: The specified method is not allowed against this resource.

member.summary: A SOAP attachment was expected, but none were found.

member.summary: There is no such thing as a logging status subresource for a key.

member.summary: The specified bucket does not exist.

member.summary: The lifecycle configuration does not exist.

member.summary: The version ID specified in the request does not match an existing version.

member.summary: A header you provided implies functionality that is not implemented.

member.summary: A conflicting conditional operation is currently in progress against this resource. Try again.

member.summary: The bucket you are attempting to access must be addressed using the specified endpoint. Send all future requests to this endpoint.

member.summary: At least one of the preconditions you specified did not hold.

member.summary: Your socket connection to the server was not read from or written to within the timeout period.

member.summary: The difference between the request time and the server's time is too large.

member.summary: The HTTP status code to return to the requestor (client).

member.summary: User-supplied headers to include in the response.

member.summary: User-supplied content-type to include in the response.

member.name: P:S3ServerInterface.S3Response.ContentLength
member.summary: The length of the data in the response stream. This value must be set before assigning the stream.

member.name: P:S3ServerInterface.S3Response.Data
member.summary: The data to return to the requestor. Set ContentLength before assigning the stream.

member.name: P:S3ServerInterface.S3Response.Chunked
member.summary: Enable or disable chunked transfer-encoding. By default this parameter is set to the value of Chunked in the S3Request object. If Chunked is false, use Send() APIs. If Chunked is true, use SendChunk() or SendFinalChunk() APIs. The Send(ErrorCode) API is valid for both conditions.

member.summary: Instantiate the object.

member.summary: Instantiate the object without supplying a stream. Useful for HEAD responses.

member.summary: Instantiate the object.

member.summary: Send the response to the requestor and close the connection.

member.summary: Send the response with the supplied data to the requestor and close the connection.

member.summary: Send an error response to the requestor and close the connection.

member.summary: Returns a human-readable string with the object details.

member.name: T:S3ServerInterface.S3Server
member.summary: S3 server. Bucket names must not be in the hostname; they must be in the URL path.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Server.ConsoleDebug
member.summary: Enable or disable console debugging for various items.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Server.Service
member.summary: Callback methods for requests received for service operations.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Server.Bucket
member.summary: Callback methods for requests received for bucket operations.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Server.Object
member.summary: Callback methods for requests received for object operations.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Server.PreRequestHandler
member.summary: Callback method to use prior to examining requests for AWS S3 APIs. Return true if you wish to terminate the request, otherwise, return false, which will further route the request.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Server.DefaultRequestHandler
member.summary: Callback method to call when no matching AWS S3 API callback could be found. This callback should return an S3Response at all times.

member.name: F:S3ServerInterface.S3Server.SendExceptionsInResponses
member.summary: Specify whether or not exceptions should be included in status 500 Internal Server Error messages.

member.name: M:S3ServerInterface.S3Server.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Instantiate the object. Using this constructor results in no pre-request handler (your own API handler), and no custom default request handler (when an S3 API cannot be matched).
member.param: The hostname on which to listen.

member.name: M:S3ServerInterface.S3Server.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Func{S3ServerInterface.S3Request,S3ServerInterface.S3Response,System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Instantiate the object. Using this constructor results in no pre-request handler (your own API handler), but (if not null) allows a custom default request handler (when an S3 API cannot be matched).
member.param: The hostname on which to listen.
Default request handler used when no other callbacks can be found.

member.name: M:S3ServerInterface.S3Server.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Func{S3ServerInterface.S3Request,S3ServerInterface.S3Response,System.Threading.Tasks.Task{System.Boolean}},System.Func{S3ServerInterface.S3Request,S3ServerInterface.S3Response,System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Instantiate the object. Using this constructor results in (if not null) a pre-request handler (your own API handler), and (if not null) a custom default request handler (when an S3 API cannot be matched).
member.param: The hostname on which to listen.
Request handler to call prior to evaluating for S3 requests, can be null.
Default request handler used when no other callbacks can be found.

member.summary: Tear down the client and dispose of background workers.
